metadata.title: iGirlDress Little Girls Red Black Velvet Plaid Holiday Fall Christmas Girls Dress 3Mos-12
features: A Christmas, Holiday dress that is perfect for girls that enjoy wearing vintage plaid prints
Zipper closure w/ irremovable taffeta tie back sash, Tea length
description: Christmas, Holiday Dress that is perfect for girls that enjoy wearing vintage plaid prints. The gown features black/Red short/long sleeved velvet bodice with ribbon bow on waist leading to a coordinating plaid skirt. It makes a nice Christmas dress perfect for winter holiday. The dress comes with zipper closure and tie sash for extra cuteness. Suitable for baby, Little, big girls. Made in USA.
